lead_paragraph: The dispute erupted last week after the Investigation Department, which is conducting an inquiry into the deal, released its report and chided the Law Department for withholding or redacting reams of documents potentially related to a nursing home.

headline.print_headline: Public Feud  by Agencies  Over Inquiry  in Deed Case
headline.main: City Agencies Engage in Public Feud Over de Blasio Investigation

snippet: The dispute erupted last week after the Investigation Department, which is conducting an inquiry into the deal, released its report and chided the Law Department for withholding or redacting reams of documents potentially related to a nursing home...
abstract: New York City's Investigation Dept and Law Dept trade blows over Law Dept's alleged withholding of documents in $116 million sale of Rivington House, nursing home on Manhattan's Lower East Side.
